Package Classes.Time

Class DateTimeFormatHelper

java.lang.Object
Classes.Time.DateTimeFormatHelper
public class DateTimeFormatHelper extends Object
The DateTimeFormatHelper Class Helps format date and time and manage manually advanced time

    • formatToLocalDate

      public static LocalDate formatToLocalDate​(String date) throws DateTimeParseException
      Method to convert a string entry in dd/mm/yyyy format into a LovalDate data. Throws DateTimeParseException if errors occur.
      Parameters:
      date - Input formatted string to be converted
      Returns:
      Converted result LocalDate data
      Throws:
      DateTimeParseException - exception to be thrown if the input string is incorrectly formatted.

    • formatToLocalTime

      public static LocalTime formatToLocalTime​(String time) throws DateTimeParseException
      Method to convert a string entry in HH:mm into a LocalTime data. Throws DateTimeParseException if errors occur.
      Parameters:
      time - Input formatted string to be converted
      Returns:
      Converted result LocalTime data
      Throws:
      DateTimeParseException - exception to be thrown if the input string is incorrectly formatted

    • getTimeDifferenceMinutes

      public static long getTimeDifferenceMinutes​(LocalTime time1, LocalTime time2)
      Calculate and return the difference in two time stamps in minutes.
      Parameters:
      time1 - the first time entry
      time2 - the second time entry
      Returns:
      the difference of the two time entries in minutes

    • compareIfBeforeToday

      public static boolean compareIfBeforeToday​(LocalDate inputDate)
      Compare if an input date is before the date of today. Return true if the input is before today.
      Parameters:
      inputDate - the input date for comparison
      Returns:
      the comparison result. true if the input date is before today.

    • checkResvTimeSession

      public static boolean checkResvTimeSession​(LocalTime resvTime, LocalTime sessionStart, LocalTime sessionEnd)
      Check if an input time is within a certain operation session of restaurant. Return true if yes.
      Parameters:
      resvTime - input time to be compared with restaurant operation sessions
      sessionStart - start time of the operation session
      sessionEnd - end time of the operation session
      Returns:
      the return boolean value. True if the input time is within the operation session.

    • validateDate

      public static boolean validateDate​(String date) throws InputMismatchException, NumberFormatException, ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Take an input string and validate if the string is correctly formatted, and if the string represents a meaningful date. Validate for the following: 1.Months with 30 days. 2.Febrarys with 28 or 29 days. 3.Validate months and days input. Return boolean true if the string is correctedly formatted and represents a valid date, and return false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      date - input string to be verified
      Returns:
      return true if the string is correctly formatted, and represents a valid date
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - Thrown if the string cannot be parsed to integer
      NumberFormatException - Thrown if string input is received
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - Thrown if the format of input string is incorrect

    • inbuiltDateTime

      public static LocalDateTime inbuiltDateTime()
      Return the program date and time with the modifier. Note: the modified program time is ahead of real system time.
      Returns:
      return the program date and time

    • inbuiltDate

      public static LocalDate inbuiltDate()
      Return the program date with the modifier.
      Returns:
      return the program date

    • inbuiltTime

      public static LocalTime inbuiltTime()
      Return the program time with the modifier
      Returns:
      return the program time

    • inbuiltSession

      public static Reservation.ReservationSession inbuiltSession​(LocalTime time)
      Return the operation session the input time is in. Return null if the input time is not in an operation session.
      Parameters:
      time - input time to be checked
      Returns:
      the session the input time is in. Null if the input time is not in a session.

    • advanceTime

      public static void advanceTime()
      Function for manually advance program time. The global variable TIME_MODIFIER is incremented. Options are provided to advance time in days, hours or minutes.

    • synchronize

      public static void synchronize()
      Synchronize the program. Check for any expired reservations and update table status if applicable.
